attributes.agent_name: Motus Ford Paarden Eiland Used Cars
attributes.description:
2012 VOLKSWAGEN GOLF VI 1.4 TSi TRENDLINE
This quality used vehicle is at Motus Ford Paarden Eiland, just next to the N1 in Cape Town. We deliver nationwide and will arrange your finance and insurance with ease. We have a full range pre-owned Ford and other popular brands of used vehicles. We would like to give you the best deal on a used car or low mileage demo vehicle.
We also offer value added products such as:
Mechanical Breakdown Warranty
Maintenance and Service Plans
Crystal Fusion Windshield Protection / Reduces Night Glare
Restore it Care – Bodyline and Interior Maintenance
Matrix – Beame Recovery
Smash & Grab Window Protection

attributes.description:
Motus Nissan Centurion offers nationwide delivery to all of our valued customers as well as our very
own Finance and Insurance Manager who is ready to help with finance at our dealership
or over the phone for your CONVENIENCE in a matter of MINUTES with all 4 major banks. All of our vehicles come
with a 160-point QUALITY Check meaning they check every part of the vehicle to make sure it is
101% Roadworthy as well as 101% PERFECT just for you! Please note that the price
advertised excludes our Documentation, License and Delivery fees all at one standard
price. Test Drives and Trade Ins are most certainly welcome.
MOTUS NISSAN CENTURION, where customers become friends

attributes.description:
Enjoy simply sitting in the T-Cross. The front seats offer several benefits when it comes to comfort: 
A high seat position adds comfort during travel and makes it easier to get in and out of the vehicle
The standard lumbar support is particularly easy on the back and relaxes your back muscles even on long journeys
All vehicles quality checked by our highly qualified technicians, to ensure your vehicle is as good as new. Contact one of our very friendly and highly professional sales staff members to tailor your deal on this vehicle today! Finance can be arranged. Test drives and trade ins welcome!
